mapper.insert: insert into ask (writer, asknum, askcontents, askdate, f_num, e_num, asktitle, ask_state, read) values(#{writer}, ask_seq.nextval, #{askcontents}, sysdate, #{f_num}, #{e_num}, #{asktitle}, '답변중', '안읽음')
mapper.select: select writer, asktitle, askdate, answercontents, answerdate, asknum, ad_num, ask_state , read from ask where f_num = #{f_num} and ask_state = '답변완료' and read = '안읽음' order by ask_state desc
select writer, asktitle, askdate, answercontents, answerdate, asknum, ad_num, ask_state, read from ask where f_num = #{f_num} and ask_state = '답변완료' and read = '읽음' order by ask_state desc
select writer, asktitle, askdate , answercontents, answerdate, asknum, ad_num, ask_state, read from ask where e_num = #{e_num} and ask_state = '답변완료' and read = '안읽음' order by ask_state desc
select writer, asktitle, askdate, answercontents, answerdate, asknum, ad_num, ask_state, read from ask where e_num = #{e_num} and ask_state = '답변완료' and read = '읽음' order by ask_state desc
select answertitle, answercontents, ad_num, answerdate from ask where asknum = #{asknum}
mapper.update: update ask set read = '읽음' where asknum = #{asknum}
